modified_SQL_query: CREATE VIEW UNIT_PRICE AS SELECT MIN(MIL.InvoiceLineID) FROM Sales.InvoiceLines AS MIL WHERE MIL.InvoiceID = subquery1_1

subquery_dictionary.subquery1_1: SELECT MIN(I.InvoiceId) FROM Sales.Invoices AS I, Sales.InvoiceLines AS IL WHERE I.InvoiceID = IL.InvoiceID AND I.CustomerID = 1060
